FindingName: Storage Accounts Minimum TLS Version Less Than TLSv1.2
Description: The identified Storage Accounts have configurations that allow insecure TLS versions. TLS 1.0 and 1.1 are susceptible to downgrade attacks and other vulnerabilities. All Storage Accounts should accept at a minimum TLS version 1.2.
Remediation: Go to storage accounts→select the affected storage account→under the "Minimum TLS version", select Version 1.2, and save.

References.Text: Enforce a minimum required version of Transport Layer Security (TLS) for requests to a storage account
